name: Trail
description: Container for Trail. Trails consist primarily of Chapters, which contain either a transclude or list of Pages.

fields.name: dependencies
fields.description: Array of ID strings. Dependencies are downloaded at initial stage of Trail compilation, must be defined here if transcluding Chapters from other Trails

fields.name: description
fields.description: HTML that is used as a splash when the trail is selected, providing some information about the trail.

fields.name: mixin
fields.description: URL of Angular components to add, before the trail is compiled. Must be prefixed by Application.Extensions._____

fields.name: contents
fields.description: Array of Chapters. The contents of the trail. Refer to Chapter and Page schemas.
